resources.string:
"Thanks for trying out ActivityWatch for Android!" "It's not quite as matured as ActivityWatch on other platforms, but it's a great step in the right direction and we think it's ready enough to put out there!"
"

To get started, open the drawer menu in the top left and click on "Activity".
"

The next step for us is to get cross-device synchronization in place, but it might take a while since we really want to get it right."
"
If you're new to ActivityWatch, you should also check out the desktop version of ActivityWatch."
